text: int lar , t ; void tri ( int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int i , int j ) { static int sum = 0 ; sum += a [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( i == t - 1 ) { if ( lar < sum ) lar = sum ; if ( j == t - 1 ) printf ( "%d\n" , lar ) ; return ; } tri ( a , i + 1 , j ) ; sum -= a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; tri ( a , i + 1 , j + 1 ) ; sum -= a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } int main ( ) { int i , n , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , lar = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; tri ( a , 0 , 0 ) ; } return 0 ; }
